name: auth-service
description: **Step 1** - retrieve the .credential.zip file from the organization's box account via [https://ibm.box.com/s/7mgtvv5yrvjs1k95pm74ib2jnpmstt4n](https://ibm.box.com/s/7mgtvv5yrvjs1k95pm74ib2jnpmstt4n) and extract the zip file to `./auth-service`    - *NOTE 1: obtain password to the zip file from a engineering team member, eg: Chase Oliphant or Daniel Smith*      - *NOTE 2: To update credentials run  `$ zip -re credentials.zip .credentials` from `./auth-service` and upload to box*
